abilities.name: Guard Firestorm
about: Rains numerous fiery bolts in an area

abilities.name: Guard Flammability
about: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to fire damage and gives damage hit more chance to ignite

abilities.name: Flameblast
about: Channels to build up a large explosion

abilities.name: Discharge
about: Discharges all the encounter's charges to deal lightning damage to all nearby enemies

abilities.name: Flame Golem
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter

abilities.name: Enduring Cry
about: Performs a warcry, taunting all nearby enemies to attack the encounter and granting endurance charges. Gives a brief burst of life regeneration, as well as a buff which grants resistances and physical damage reduction

abilities.name: Flame Dash
about: Teleports encounter to random location in an area
Encounter leaves burning ground behind them

abilities.name: Fire Bombs
about: Spawns multiple Bombs around the arena that explode after a delay

abilities.name: Living Bomb
about: Charges up and detonates after short delay

abilities.name: Firestorm
about: Rains numerous fiery bolts in an area

abilities.name: Cyclone
about: Damages enemies around encounter, then performs a spinning series of attacks as it travels to a target location

abilities.name: Molten Strike
about: Attack causes balls of molten magma to launch forth from the enemies encounter hits
